name: EGFRUsing2021RaceFreeFormulas
title: eGFR Using 2021 Race Free Formulas
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for the eGFR calculations developed by NKF-ASN Task Force on Reassessing the Inclusion of Race in Diagnosing Kidney Disease Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate.),(Data Element Scope: Any data element which references eGFR observations calculated using the race-free creatinine-only 2021 CKD formula or the creatinine-and-cystatin 2021 CKD formula.),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC components eGFRcr SerPlBld CKD-EPI 2021 and eGFRcr-cys SerPlBld CKD-EPI 2021),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINC components which use an eGFR calculation method that is not one of "race-free creatinine-only 2021 CKD formula" or "creatinine-and-cystatin 2021 CKD formula")

concept.display: Glomerular filtration rate/1.73 sq M.predicted [Volume Rate/Area] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Creatinine-based formula (CKD-EPI 2021)
Glomerular filtration rate/1.73 sq M.predicted [Volume Rate/Area] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Creatinine and Cystatin C-based formula (CKD-EPI 2021)
